elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Characterize the job types below in keywords.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Management positions (instances)
elements.correctAnswer: Are superior to other departments and thus perform management tasks; have decision-making and directive powers.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Executing agencies
elements.correctAnswer: Have no subordinate positions and no management tasks; they have decision-making powers but no authority to issue orders.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Staff units
elements.correctAnswer: They are auxiliary bodies that support and relieve other bodies; they have no authority to issue orders.
